resources.string: Click to know the latest updates on Malaysia\'s vaccination program
Click to know the latest health updates from The Ministry of Health (MOH)

Company: US, Germany
Type of Vaccine:mRNA
Number of Shots: 2 shots, 21 days apart into muscle 
Effectiveness: 95%
Does NOT contain: Eggs, preservatives, latex

 What is the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine?
The Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine is an unapproved vaccine that may preventCOVID-19. There is no FDA-approved vaccine to prevent COVID-19.The FDA has authorized the emergency use of the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine to prevent COVID-19 in individuals 12 years of age and older under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).

Who should get the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine? 
FDA has authorized the emergency use of the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine individuals 12 years of age and older.

Who should NOT get the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine 
You should not get the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine if you:
 • had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of this vaccine
 • had a severe allergic reaction to any ingredient of this vaccine

Company: China
Type of Vaccine: Inactivated virus vaccine
Number of Shots: 2 shots, 21 days apart into muscle Effectiveness: 68%
Does NOT contain: Eggs, preservatives, latex

 What is the Sinovac CoronaVac COVID-19 Vaccine?
The Sinovac CoronaVac COVID-19 Vaccine is an unapproved vaccine that may preventCOVID-19. There is no FDA-approved vaccine to prevent COVID-19.The FDA has authorized the emergency use of the Sinovac CoronaVac COVID-19 Vaccine to prevent COVID-19 in individuals 12 years of age and older under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).

Who should get the Sinovac CoronaVac COVID-19 Vaccine? 
FDA has authorized the emergency use of the Sinovac CoronaVac COVID-19 Vaccine individuals 18 years of age and older.

Who should NOT get the Sinovac CoronaVac COVID-19 Vaccine: 
You should not get the Sinovac CoronaVac COVID-19 Vaccine if you:
 • had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of this vaccine
 • had a severe allergic reaction to any ingredient of this vaccine

Company: Oxford
Type of Vaccine: Chimpanzee adenovirus
Number of Shots: 2 shots, 28 days apart into muscle Effectiveness: 90%
Does NOT contain: Eggs, preservatives, latex

 What is the AstraZeneca COVID-19 Vaccine?
The AstraZeneca COVID-19 Vaccine is an unapproved vaccine that may preventCOVID-19. There is no FDA-approved vaccine to prevent COVID-19.The FDA has authorized the emergency use of the AstraZeneca COVID-19 Vaccine to prevent COVID-19 in individuals 12 years of age and older under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).

Who should get the AstraZeneca COVID-19 Vaccine? 
FDA has authorized the emergency use of the AstraZeneca COVID-19 Vaccine individuals 18 years of age and older.

Who should NOT get the AstraZeneca COVID-19 Vaccine 
You should not get the AstraZeneca COVID-19 Vaccine if you:
 • had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of this vaccine
 • had a severe allergic reaction to any ingredient of this vaccine
